id.comment: Unique identifier, auto-generated. It's the primary key.

inserted.comment: Timestamp when current record is inserted

updated.comment: Timestamp when current record is updated

etag.comment: Possible ETag for all resources that are external. Allows for better synch-ing.

comments.comment: General comments. Can be used for anything useful related to the instance.

email.comment: Main email to communicate for that account

enabled.comment: Whether it is enabled or not. Disabled instances will not be used.

externalId.comment: External unique ID, used to refer to external accounts

name.comment: Descriptive name to identify the instance

preferences.comment: All the general options associated with the account.

constraints.name: email
constraints.check: email IS NULL OR email RLIKE '^[^@]+@[^@]+[.][^@]{2,}$'

constraints.name: phone
constraints.check: phone IS NULL OR phone RLIKE '^[0-9]{8,16}$'
